charges.charge_description: On or about August 2, 2016, in the Western District of Missouri, the defendant, ERIC L. MACK, having  been convicted of a crime punishable by imprisonment for a term exceeding one year, did knowingly possess, in  and affecting commerce, a firearm, to wit: a Smith &; Wesson, model M&;P P45, .45 caliber semi-automatic  handgun, bearing Serial Number DYD7492, which had been transported in interstate commerce, contrary to the  provisions of Title 18, United States Code, Sections 922(g)(1) and 924(a)(2).
